text: ivvaru, nam ovvoruvaraiyum avaravar ceyta pavattin karanamakap pitittom; avarkalil cilar mitu katumpuyal mulamaka kalmariyai anuppinom; avarkalil cilarai periti mulakkam pitittuk kontatu avarkalil cilaraip pumiyinul aluntac ceytom; avarkalil cilarai mulkatittom; anal allah avarkalukku aniyayam ceyvatarkaka irukka villai avarkal tamakkut tame aniyayam ceytu kontarkal
